original_title: Finance Secretary grilled in 10 hour CID interrogation over Human Immunoglobulin imports
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The Criminal Investigation Department recorded statements from four officials including the Secretary of the Ministry of Finance, for more than 10 hours yesterday regarding the supply of fake Human Immunoglobulin.
A senior officer of the Criminal Investigation Department said that he was questioned about how funds were released by the Ministry of Finance to purchase the drug.
Meanwhile, statements will also be recorded from the former Health Minister Keheliya Rambukwella over the incident.

The Criminal Investigation Department recently obtained an order from the Maligakanda Magistrate's Court to inspect the files of seven institutions including the Ministry of Finance, the Medical Supplies Division and the Ministry of Health.
